类 DynamicImage

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.dynamic.DynamicObject
org.kelvinizer.dynamic.DynamicImage
所有已实现的接口:
Activatable, Drawable
public class DynamicImage extends DynamicObject
The DynamicImage class represents an image that can be animated by applying motions to its position over time. It extends DynamicObject and implements rendering and activation functionality for the image.

This class is used to display images on screen, with support for motion effects and transformations based on time.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • DynamicImage

      public DynamicImage(CRect bounds)
      Constructs a new DynamicImage with specified bounds.
      参数:
      bounds - the bounds of the image as a CRect

  • 方法详细资料

    • setImage

      public void setImage(BufferedImage bf)
      Sets the image to be rendered.
      参数:
      bf - the BufferedImage to be displayed

    • getImage

      public BufferedImage getImage()
      Retrieves the buffered image. This method returns the current instance of the BufferedImage stored in the class. The returned image can be used for various purposes, such as displaying or manipulating the image data.
      返回:
      the BufferedImage object representing the image.

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g2d, long time)
      Renders the image at its current position, applying motion transformations based on the time passed. The image's position is updated according to the horizontal and vertical motions.
      指定者:
      render 在类中 DynamicObject
      参数:
      g2d - the Graphics2D object used for rendering the image
      time - the current time in nanoseconds, used for calculating the position based on motion
